headline.print_headline: How to Win Putin’s Information War
headline.main: Putin Is Waging Information Warfare. Here’s How to Fight Back.

snippet: The Russian president fears failure the most. So the best idea is a concept from nuclear policy: deterrence....
abstract: Editorial by Mark Galeotti of Institute of Intentional Relations Prague, contends best defense against Russian cyberattacks is deterrence; urges increases better cybersecurity, increased global finance regulations and punitive measures like sanctions; suggests United States stop mythologizing Putin as supervillain and instead hold up mirror in which he can see, and be held accountable for, his numerous failures.
